vernac_cmds: Program Definition sig_sig_iff {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a) (x: sig P): sig Q := x.
Program Definition sig_sig_iff' {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a) (x: sig Q): sig P := x.
Program Definition sig_sig_eq {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a) (x: sig P): sig Q := x.
Program Definition sig_sig_eq' {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a) (x: sig Q): sig P := x.
Program Definition sigsig_sig {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (x: sig (fun x: sig P => Q (proj1_sig x))): sig (fun x => P x /\ Q x) := x.
Program Definition sig_sigsig {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (x: sig (fun x => P x /\ Q x)): sig (fun x: sig P => Q (proj1_sig x)) := x.
Program Definition bij_f_sig {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop) (x: sig P): sig (fun b => P (bij_g _ _ f b)) := bij_f _ _ f x.
Program Definition bij_g_sig {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop) (x: sig (fun b => P (bij_g _ _ f b))): sig P := bij_g _ _ f x.
Lemma sig_sig_iff_iff': forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a) x, (sig_sig_iff H) (sig_sig_iff' H x) = x.
Lemma sig_sig_iff'_iff: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a) x, (sig_sig_iff' H) (sig_sig_iff H x) = x.
Lemma sig_sig_eq_eq': forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a) x, (sig_sig_eq H) (sig_sig_eq' H x) = x.
Lemma sig_sig_eq'_eq: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a) x, (sig_sig_eq' H) (sig_sig_eq H x) = x.
Lemma sig_sigsig_sig: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} x, @sig_sigsig A P Q (@sigsig_sig A P Q x) = x.
Lemma sigsig_sig_sigsig: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} x, @sigsig_sig A P Q (@sig_sigsig A P Q x) = x.
Lemma sig_sig_iff_iff'_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a), (sig_sig_iff H) oo (sig_sig_iff' H) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
Lemma bij_fg_sig: forall {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop) x, bij_f_sig f P (bij_g_sig f P x) = x.
destruct x; unfold bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
Lemma bij_gf_sig: forall {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop) x, bij_g_sig f P (bij_f_sig f P x) = x.
destruct x; unfold bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
Lemma sig_sig_iff'_iff_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a), (sig_sig_iff' H) oo (sig_sig_iff H) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
Lemma sig_sig_eq_eq'_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a), (sig_sig_eq H) oo (sig_sig_eq' H) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_eq, sig_sig_eq'; simpl.
Lemma sig_sig_eq'_eq_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a), (sig_sig_eq' H) oo (sig_sig_eq H) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
Lemma sig_sigsig_sig_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop}, sig_sigsig oo (@sigsig_sig A P Q) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sigsig, sigsig_sig; simpl.
Lemma sigsig_sig_sigsig_id: forall {A: Type} {P Q: A -> Prop}, sigsig_sig oo (@sig_sigsig A P Q) = id _.
unfold id, compose, sig_sigsig, sigsig_sig; simpl.
Lemma bij_fg_sig_id: forall {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop), (bij_f_sig f P) oo (bij_g_sig f P) = id _.
destruct x; unfold compose, id, bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
Lemma bij_gf_sig_id: forall {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop), (bij_g_sig f P) oo (bij_f_sig f P) = id _.
destruct x; unfold compose, id, bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
Definition sig_sig_iff_bij {A} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a <-> Q a): bijection (sig P) (sig Q).
Definition sig_sig_eq_bij {A} {P Q: A -> Prop} (H: forall a, P a = Q a): bijection (sig P) (sig Q).
Definition sig_sigsig_bij {A} (P Q: A -> Prop): bijection (sig (fun a => P a /\ Q a)) (sig (fun a: sig P => Q (proj1_sig a))).
Definition bij_sig {A B} (f: bijection A B) (P: A -> Prop): bijection (sig P) (sig (fun b => P (bij_g _ _ f b))).

command: unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
destruct x; unfold bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
destruct x; unfold bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_eq, sig_sig_eq'; simpl.
unfold id, compose, sig_sig_iff, sig_sig_iff'; simpl.
unfold id, compose, sig_sigsig, sigsig_sig; simpl.
unfold id, compose, sig_sigsig, sigsig_sig; simpl.
destruct x; unfold compose, id, bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
destruct x; unfold compose, id, bij_f_sig, bij_g_sig; simpl.
